APPLE INC.'s Virtual Shareholder's Meeting - Pre meeting message page Apple Inc. Annual Meeting of Shareholders Apple Inc. Annual Meeting of Shareholders Pre Meeting Apple Inc. is hosting a Virtual Shareholder Meeting on Tuesday, February 24, 2026 at 8:00 A.M. Pacific Time. Shareholders of record as of January 2, 2026 will be able to vote and ask questions online during the meeting. If you would like to attend the virtual meeting and have your control number, please log in 15 minutes prior to the start of the meeting. You further attest that the information provided by you below is accurate and complete. Checkbox is not checked.
